name: Project Mood
description: Project Mood is a life simulation video game set in an apartment of a newly moved in individual. When moving in we help our character managing their mood by going around in this apartment and doing various self-care routines by playing small minigames. Feeling hungry head over to the stove and cook some food! Feeling a little bit stressed, head over to the couch for some breathing exercises. The minigames are inspired by everyday life and some of them you can even play along with in real life.
